page.title: 09Out of School
page.content:
There are a variety of different activities to get involved with in this town.The Youth Club, Golf Course and Tennis Courts are open every day. In addition to this the following activities are available: MON....Scouts,Brownies,Swimming Club, Red Cross. TUES...Boys'Brigade,Brownies,Guides, Swimming Club Crazy Night. WED....Karate,Swimming Club,Brownies, Guides. THUR...Boys'Brigade,Cubs,Swimming Club, Highland Dancing Class. FRI....Discos, Swimming Club. SAT....Roller Rama.
Even though we have all these activities, children in this town would like something more like a cinema, horse riding and river sports.
